sentences.en: Breast-feeding is as natural as sex or elimination or any other bodily function.
sentences.cn: 母乳哺养是天生的，就像性交、排泄或者其他任何身体功能一样。

sentences.en: But in some cases it has meant the elimination of jobs.
sentences.cn: 但在某些情况下自动化意味着减少就业机会.

sentences.en: Casts are usually soiled either during eating or elimination.
sentences.cn: 在喂食或排泄时管型经常受到污染.

sentences.en: I recommend that you be relentless in the elimination of the backlog of defects and feature enhancements.
sentences.cn: 我建议你在消除积压的缺陷和不断膨胀的特征时毫不留情。

sentences.en: If you need to remove an agent you will have to do it by a process of elimination.
sentences.cn: 如果您需要删除代理，将必须通过消除进程的方式进行此工作。

sentences.en: In all, the new president selected 150 individual programs for cuts or elimination.
sentences.cn: 总而言之,新的总统150个人项目选择削减或者消除。

sentences.en: It contains the seeds of its own self - elimination.
sentences.cn: 它孕育着自我淘汰的种子.

sentences.en: It is already possible to start moving toward the elimination of nuclear weapons.
sentences.cn: 已有可能朝着消除核武器的目标努力。

sentences.en: Most of the regime's left-wing opponents were eliminated.
sentences.cn: 这个政权的左翼反对派多数已被除掉。。

sentences.en: The answer is not elimination of private enterprise in the media.
sentences.cn: 答案并不在于消灭传播媒介中的私人企业.

sentences.en: The combined addition - elimination sequence is referred to as a condensation reaction.
sentences.cn: 将联合加成 - 消除反应的结果称为缩合反应.

sentences.en: The elimination of all nuclear weapons would make the world a safer place.
sentences.cn: 销毁所有的核武器将会使世界变得更安全。

sentences.en: the elimination of lead in petrol
sentences.cn: 除去汽油中的铅

sentences.en: The kidney is the most important organ for elimination of drugs and their metabolites.
sentences.cn: 肾脏是消除药物及其代谢产物最重要的器官.

sentences.en: The police have eliminated two suspects from their investigation.
sentences.cn: 警方通过调查已经排除了两名嫌疑犯。

sentences.en: The successful application of the size and of resin depends on the successful elimination of air.
sentences.cn: 施加浸润剂和施加树脂的成功取决于充分排除空气.

sentences.en: Their elimination from the competition was a great surprise.
sentences.cn: 他们在比赛中遭到淘汰是个很大的意外.

sentences.en: Therefore, the objective of public risk management should be minimization, not elimination, of risk - related costs.
sentences.cn: 因此, 公共风险管理的目标应该是尽量减少与风险相关的代价, 而不是彻底消除.

sentences.en: This is a single elimination tournament.
sentences.cn: 这是一场简单的淘汰赛.

sentences.en: Treatment is based on elimination of moisture from the ear canal.
sentences.cn: 治疗首先在于消除耳道内的水分.

sentences.en: We determined to begin elimination of the objectionable characters.
sentences.cn: 我们决定铲除几个最为人反对的人物.

sentences.en: Worked had only then known that, the original elimination exploitation only was one kind of fable.
sentences.cn: 工作了才知道，原来消灭剥削只是一种传说。

trans.tran_en: the removal or destruction of something
